app.function.Function

    Package Description
    app.curveFetting  
    app.integrale

    • Uses of Function in app.rootFinding

      Methods in app.rootFinding with parameters of type Function 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double RootFinding.findRootWithBisection(Function f, double a, double b, int MaxIter)
      A static method that use the Bisection algorithm to find 1 root in a range [a,b]
      Conditions of work :
      - the function have to be monotone and continuous in the range [a,b]
      static double RootFinding.findRootWithNewtonRaphson(Function f, Function df, double a, double b, int MaxIter)
      A static method that use the Newton Raphson algorithm to find 1 root in a range [a,b]
      Conditions of work :
      - the function have to be continuous in the range [a,b]
      - the function can be derived
      static double RootFinding.findRootWithSecant(Function f, double x0, double x1, int MaxIter)
      A static method that use the Scant algorithm to find 1 root
      Conditions of work :
      - We have to give it 2 point like approximation of the root
